sentences.en: Multiculturalism can be a rewarding, enriching experience, but it can also lead to a clash of values.
sentences.cn: 多元文化主义可以是一种有益的丰富经历，但它也可能导致价值观的冲突。

sentences.en: That's a bit beyond the reach of most students! I had flown from San Francisco to Virginia to attend a conference on multiculturalism.
sentences.cn: 这对大多数学生来说有点遥不可及！我从旧金山飞到弗吉尼亚参加一个关于多元文化主义的会议。

sentences.en: I suppose you could call it multiculturalism.
sentences.cn: 我想你们会称之为多元文化主义。
